Query: select (sid.unit_price * sid.quantity) as Sales, date(trans_date) as Date, b.name as Branch from sales_invoice as si inner join sales_invoice_detail as sid on si.id_sales_invoice = sid.id_sales_invoice left join app_branch as b on si.id_branch = b.id_branch where si.id_company = * Company * and si.trans_date between * StartDate * and * EndDate * and si.id_branch = * Branch * group by date(trans_date) order by date(trans_date)
Caption: Sales per Day
Label: Date
